data.title: Discover Aldiola, a family resort in Sant'Antonio di Gallura
data.meta_description: Aldiola Country Resort is a 4-star hotel near Lago del Liscia, surrounded by the nature of the Sardinian countryside. Book your wellness holiday!
data.text:
The Aldiola Country Resort is a beautiful 4 star hotel on the Costa Smeralda, lies in the mediterranean scrub surrounded by secular cork and holm oak trees. It rises on the hills overlooking the Liscia lake.

The 4-star hotel in Sardinia reflects the architectural features of the pastoral region of Gallura, with rooms arranged in characteristic buildings overlooking spectacular views of the lake. All areas are furnished in typical sardinian style, with an attentive choice of various woodwork, fabrics and ceramics produced by the finest craftsmen on the island. The Aldiola offers you a starting point for sports itineraries and impressive nature exursions.
